title: Complete HubSpot Setup Journey
description: Complete 20-step journey from your 6-step form through full HubSpot onboarding with affiliate tracking

steps.title: Welcome & Value Proposition
steps.description: Explain HubSpot value and collect basic contact information
steps.content:
Welcome to your HubSpot setup journey! We'll guide you through creating a powerful CRM and marketing automation system for your business.

**What you'll get:**
- Complete CRM with contact management
- Email marketing automation
- Sales pipeline tracking
- Website analytics and lead capture
- Integration with your existing tools

spotlight.message: Let's start by entering your name to personalize your HubSpot experience

steps.title: Your Business Information
steps.description: Collect company details, website, size, and industry
steps.content:
Now let's learn about your business to customize your HubSpot setup.

**We'll collect:**
- Company name and website
- Business size (employees)
- Industry type
- Current tools you're using

spotlight.message: Enter your company name so we can personalize your HubSpot workspace

steps.title: Your Goals & Role
steps.description: Identify your role and primary HubSpot objectives
steps.content:
Understanding your role and goals helps us set up the right HubSpot features for you.

**Tell us:**
- Your role (Owner, Sales, Marketing, etc.)
- Primary goal (Generate leads, Close deals, Nurture customers)
- Current challenges you're facing

spotlight.message: Select your primary role to customize your HubSpot dashboard

steps.title: CRM Starter Information
steps.description: Prepare sample contact and deal data for your CRM
steps.content:
Let's prepare some sample data to get your CRM started quickly.

**We'll help you add:**
- Sample contact information
- Example deal in your pipeline
- Basic company information
- Lead source tracking

spotlight.message: Add a sample contact to see how your CRM will work

steps.title: Email & Tracking Configuration
steps.description: Set up sender information and domain tracking
steps.content:
Configure your email marketing and website tracking settings.

**We'll set up:**
- Sender name and email address
- Your website domain for tracking
- Email signature preferences
- Tracking pixel placement

spotlight.message: Enter your email address for HubSpot's email marketing features

steps.title: Invite Team & Choose Dashboard
steps.description: Add teammates and select your preferred dashboard type
steps.content:
Final step! Let's add your team and choose your dashboard.

**Complete setup:**
- Invite team members by email
- Choose dashboard type (Sales, Marketing, Service)
- Set notification preferences
- Launch your HubSpot workspace

spotlight.message: Add team member emails and select your preferred dashboard type

autoNavigate.message: Redirecting to HubSpot to complete your setup...

steps.title: Email Verification
steps.description: Verify your email address with HubSpot
steps.content:
Check your email inbox for a verification message from HubSpot.

**What to do:**
1. Look for email from HubSpot
2. Click the verification link
3. Return to this page when verified

**Extension will detect successful verification and continue automatically.**

spotlight.message: Check your email and click the verification link, then return here

steps.title: Tell Us About Your Business
steps.description: HubSpot asks for business information (we'll autofill this)
steps.content:
HubSpot is asking for your business information again. **Don't worry - we've got this!**

**Extension will automatically fill:**
- Your role and company size
- Business goals and industry
- Website and contact information

Just click 'Continue' when you see the form is filled.

spotlight.message: ‚úÖ We've pre-filled your answers based on your setup wizard. Click 'Continue' to proceed.

steps.title: Workspace Initialization
steps.description: HubSpot is creating your workspace
steps.content:
HubSpot is building your personalized workspace. This may take a few moments.

**What's happening:**
- Creating your CRM database
- Setting up your dashboard
- Configuring your workspace settings
- Preparing your sample data

spotlight.message: ‚è≥ Hang tight ‚Äî building your workspace. This usually takes 30-60 seconds.

steps.title: Import Your Contacts
steps.description: Import your contact list into HubSpot
steps.content:
Let's get your contacts into HubSpot! We've prepared a sample CSV file for you.

**What to do:**
1. Click 'Import Contacts' below
2. Upload the CSV file we prepared
3. Map the fields (Name, Email, Company)
4. Complete the import

spotlight.message: üìÅ Click here to upload your contact list. We'll guide you through the field mapping.

steps.title: Connect Your Email Inbox
steps.description: Connect Gmail or Outlook to HubSpot
steps.content:
Connect your email to sync contacts and track email interactions.

**Steps:**
1. Click 'Connect Gmail' or 'Connect Outlook'
2. Sign in to your email account
3. Allow HubSpot permissions
4. We'll detect success automatically

spotlight.message: üìß Click 'Connect Gmail' ‚Üí sign in ‚Üí allow permissions. We'll mark this step done automatically.

steps.title: Connect Your Domain
steps.description: Set up domain tracking for your website
steps.content:
Connect your website domain to track visitors and leads.

**We'll help you:**
1. Enter your domain (we'll autofill this)
2. Get the DNS records you need
3. Add them to your domain provider
4. Verify the connection

spotlight.message: üåê We've filled in your domain. Copy the CNAME record to your DNS provider (GoDaddy, etc.).

steps.title: Install Tracking Pixel
steps.description: Add HubSpot tracking code to your website
steps.content:
Install the HubSpot tracking pixel to monitor website visitors and leads.

**What to do:**
1. Copy the tracking code from HubSpot
2. Add it to your website's header
3. We'll scan your site to verify installation
4. You'll see a success badge when complete

spotlight.message: üìã Click 'Copy Pixel' and add it to your website's <head> section. We'll verify when it's live.

steps.title: Connect Analytics & Ads
steps.description: Link Google Analytics, Google Ads, and Facebook
steps.content:
Connect your marketing tools to get a complete view of your campaigns.

**Available connections:**
- Google Analytics (website traffic)
- Google Ads (ad performance)
- Facebook Ads (social campaigns)
- LinkedIn (professional network)

spotlight.message: üîó Choose the accounts you want to connect. Click the OAuth buttons to authorize.

steps.title: Add Sample CRM Data
steps.description: Create your first contact and deal in HubSpot
steps.content:
Let's add some sample data to see how your CRM works.

**We'll help you create:**
- Sample contact: 'Jane Smith - Demo Lead'
- Sample deal: '$5,000 Website Project'
- Company record: 'Acme Corp'
- Activity timeline

spotlight.message: üë§ We've pre-filled sample data. Review and click 'Save' to create your first CRM records.

steps.title: Choose Your Dashboard
steps.description: Select your preferred HubSpot dashboard layout
steps.content:
Choose the dashboard that best fits your role and goals.

**Dashboard options:**
- **Sales Dashboard**: Focus on deals and pipeline
- **Marketing Dashboard**: Focus on leads and campaigns
- **Service Dashboard**: Focus on customer support
- **Custom Dashboard**: Mix of all features

spotlight.message: üìä We picked 'Sales Dashboard' based on your earlier setup. You can change this later.

steps.title: Invite Your Team
steps.description: Add team members to your HubSpot workspace
steps.content:
Invite your team members to collaborate in HubSpot.

**We've prepared:**
- Team member email addresses from your setup
- Appropriate permission levels
- Welcome message template

You can send invites now or skip and invite later.

spotlight.message: üë• We've filled in your teammate emails. Click 'Send Invites' or skip for now.

steps.title: Optional App Suggestions
steps.description: HubSpot suggests mobile app and browser extension
steps.content:
HubSpot is suggesting additional tools to enhance your experience.

**Available options:**
- Mobile app for on-the-go access
- Browser extension for quick actions
- Desktop app for offline access

These are optional - you can skip and add later.

spotlight.message: üì± These are optional tools. You can skip this now and add them later if needed.

steps.title: Final Onboarding Checklist
steps.description: Review your setup progress and complete remaining tasks
steps.content:
Great progress! Let's review what you've completed and finish any remaining tasks.

**Completed:**
‚úÖ Email verified
‚úÖ Business info added
‚úÖ Contacts imported
‚úÖ Email connected
‚úÖ Domain connected
‚úÖ Tracking installed
‚úÖ Sample data added
‚úÖ Dashboard selected

**Remaining:**
- Complete team invitations
- Set up additional integrations

spotlight.message: üìã 7 of 9 steps complete ‚Äî almost there! Review your progress and finish any remaining tasks.
